author: ajsutton
content: <@!199561711278227457> Just circling back on this as it went unanswered (sorry) - remote validator does work fine with Teku and Bellatrix now. Early on there were some REST APIs that hadn't been defined yet so only the internal worked but that got resolved a while back.  I'd still generally recommend running the validator client internally to reduce overhead (RAM mostly).
